<noinclude>
This is the Cyclic Voltammetry template.
</noinclude>
<includeonly><tr>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{anl|}}} }}</td>
<td>{{{anl conc|}}}</td>
<td>{{#convertQuantity:{{{e0|}}}|property=E0|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}</td>
<td>{{{e0_type|}}}</td>
<td>{{#extractFromTable:{{{redox potential|}}}|row=0}}; {{#extractFromTable:{{{redox potential|}}}|row=1}}</td>
<td>
{{#if: {{{e_red_ast|}}}| {{#convertQuantity: {{{e_red_ast|}}}|property=E0|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }} | {{#extractFromTable:{{{e_red1|}}}|row=0|add={{#convertQuantity: {{{e0|}}}|property=E0|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}  }} }}
</td>
<td>
{{#if: {{{e_ox_ast|}}}| {{#convertQuantity: {{{e_ox_ast|}}}|property=E0|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }} | {{#extractFromTable:{{{e_ox1|}}}|row=0|add={{#convertQuantity: {{{e0|}}}|property=E0|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}  }} }}
</td>
<td>{{{redox_type|}}}</td>
<td>
{{#convertQuantity: {{{e_red1|}}}|property=Ered1|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}
</td>
<td>
{{#convertQuantity: {{{e_red2|}}}|property=Ered2|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}
</td>
<td>
{{#convertQuantity: {{{e_red3|}}}|property=Ered3|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}
</td>
<td>
{{#convertQuantity: {{{e_ox1|}}}|property=Eox1|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}
</td>
<td>
{{#convertQuantity: {{{e_ox2|}}}|property=Eox2|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}
</td>
<td>
{{#convertQuantity: {{{e_ox3|}}}|property=Eox3|form=Cyclic_Voltammetry_experiments }}
</td>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{solv|}}} }}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{solv vol|}}}</td>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{electrolyte|}}} }}</td>
<td>{{{electrolyte purity|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{el conc|}}}</td>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{int ref comp|}}} }}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{scan rate|}}}</td>
<td>{{{scan number|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{potential window|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{scan dir|}}}</td>
<td>{{{gas|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{temp|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{cond|}}}</td>
<td>{{{WE|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{WE area|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{CE|}}}</td>
<td>{{{RE|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{details|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{include|}}}</td>
<td>{{#subobject:
 |Analyte={{{anl|}}}
 |Analyte concentration={{{anl conc|}}}
 |Redox potential={{{redox potential|}}}
 |E0={{{e0|}}}
 |Ered1={{{e_red1|}}}
 |Ered2={{{e_red2|}}}
 |Ered3={{{e_red3|}}}
 |Eox1={{{e_ox1|}}}
 |Eox2={{{e_ox2|}}}
 |Eox3={{{e_ox3|}}}
 |Solvent A={{{solv|}}}
 |Solvent volume={{{solv vol|}}}
 |Electrolyte={{{electrolyte|}}}
 |Electrolyte purity={{{electrolyte purity|}}}
 |Electrolyte concentration={{{el conc|}}}
 |Internal reference compound={{{int ref comp|}}}
 |Scan rate={{{scan rate|}}}
 |Scan number={{{scan number|}}}
 |Potential window={{{potential window|}}}
 |Scan direction={{{scan dir|}}}
 |Gas={{{gas|}}}
 |TemperatureP={{{temp|}}}
 |Condition={{{cond|}}}
 |Working electrode={{{WE|}}}
 |Working electrode surface area={{{WE area|}}}
 |Counter electrode={{{CE|}}}
 |Reference electrode={{{RE|}}}
 |Details={{{details|}}}
 |Included={{{include|}}}
 |BasePageName={{BASEPAGENAME}}
}}</td></tr></includeonly>
